about_the_game:
Marie's Patisserie Collector's Edition

Immerse yourself in a world full of delicious treats!
Marie is looking for the perfect job. After many failures, one day she finds herself standing in front of Charlotte's small patisserie, which urgently needs a temp.
Many challenges now await Marie!

Her first attempts at baking are anything but perfect, but Marie doesn't give up.
Her sweet creations soon attract many customers and the small failures she has experienced along the way have not been in vain.
Over time, the patisserie becomes a popular meeting place for those with a sweet tooth and gourmets alike.

Features
- Entertaining Match 3 game with lots of challenges
- Open a pastry shop with all the furnishings and delicious cakes and pies
- Play many levels as well as mini and bonus games
- Acquire effective and powerful power-ups
- Choose three different game modes: normal, hard and relaxing
- Win special achievements and trophies


This is a collector's edition full of extras not included in the standard version. The collector's edition also includes:

- 50 more bonus levels
- The opening of a wonderful cafe garden for the patisserie
- All mini-games can be played again
- Downloadable background images and stickers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard

short_description: Immerse yourself in a world full of delicious treats! Marie is looking for the perfect job. After many failures, one day she finds herself standing in front of Charlotte's small patisserie, which urgently needs a temp. Many challenges now await Marie in this entertaining Match 3 game.
